channel.title: Logseq on Alex's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Logseq on Alex's personal blog

item.title: Go Logseq
item.description: What issue I have now I started jotting down my notes digitally and plain text base for a while long time, I just wanted it simple, then one work.md and day.md started bloating, naturally I divide them into separate files for different purpose, e.g. “stock-trading-record”, “vim/tmux cheatsheet”, “linux common commands” etc, then I’ve got too many files and I often ended with lots similar and overlaps files. Folder, file effortless input, efficient retrieval
